text: israyil santatikale nam katal katatti (raksappetutti.) ennitt tannalute bimbannalute mumpake bhajanamirikkunna oru janatayute atukkal avar cennetti. avar parannu: he; musa, ivarkk daivannalullat peale nannalkkum oru daivatte ni erpetuttittaranam. addeham parannu: tirccayayum ninnal vivaramillatta oru janavibhagamakunnu
